website_summaries.verdict: Golden Nugget's ghee is versatile for cooking and baking.
pros: The caramel undertones are strong with this ghee
It's fresh, subtle taste is excellent for roasting veggies and for cooking meat
cons: Flavor won't pack enough punch for some

customer_reviews.title: Very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: I'm becoming a connoisseur of ghee. My friends mock my love of ghee and throw terms around like, "addict", "snob" and "weirdo" but I don't let it phase me. So, I've tried several brands and this is my favorite. I like 4th generation vanilla bean but for sweet treats and such. Overall, plain ghee, this texture is silky, smooth and velvety in terms of mouth feel. Flavor is full butter. You can taste the freshness. I use it to sautee everything - spinach, kale, asparagus and mushrooms. I use it for eggs too. Sometimes, I eat it out if the jar. This stuff is true to it's name - gold nugget of goodness.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: All-Time Favorite Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite ghee! It tastes so good that I usually just eat it straight from the jar! It is a great synergy for the keto, low carb, Bulletproof, and paleo diets. It is a great addition to my bone broth, in tonics, blended into coffee, and smothered on vegetables or meats. It also sports a fabulous nutrition profile from the local grass-fed source which is great for gut health and digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. LaTour

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my selection
customer_reviews.text: I have honestly not tried ghee before this purchase. I didn't know exactly what it was. I am working toward a healthier lifestyle and trying to get my weight down to less than the "overweight" category on the BMI chart. One of my meal-planning sources dictated that one of the allowable fats was grass-fed ghee. So, I set about finding it. I was very pleased with my selection. I had some on my vegetables, and found it very pleasant. I do think I would try the type that has some salt added the next time. I think it would increase my enjoyment slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: O-M-Ghee (sorry)
customer_reviews.text: This ghee tastes incredible and works well for cooking or coffee or even just eating a spoonful! I am an instant fan of this company and all of their products I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Razzmatazz

customer_reviews.title: Trying something new.
customer_reviews.text: The ghee was well packaged and arrived intact and on time. I am new to trying ghee and the health benefits. So far, I would say that I love cooking with it and it enhances the taste of most dishes. I don't taste a lot of difference from butter, but some. The product was just what I was expecting. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great flavored Ghee, wonderful for Keto diet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Ghee for my Keto baking and cooking. This product is wonderful to work with. The seller was prompt in getting the Ghee shipped and it was packaged well. The flavor is outstanding. Thank you for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harlan

customer_reviews.title: It's good, if you never have your granny's butter, or sour cream or kefir.
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother use to have a cow and I remember from my childhood how home made pasture raised butter suppose to smell like. I was expecting the same aroma. But when I opened the jar, the is no smell to it good or bad. However, the taste is good. The price is reasonable. I use it for bulletproof coffee.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Better on Toast Than Butter
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and couldn't wait to try it on toast. I like it more than butter for that use. I have not tried it on anything else yet but , unlike other users, I don't wish to eat it right out of the jar !
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: OK but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience trying some Ghee (to add in more healthy fat to my Keto workout diet). I add 1 Tbsp to morning coffee along with some MCT oil and I also use it for cooking items at higher temps vs. oils. I specifically wanted the grass fed and best quality product and this fit the bill and tasted fine in my coffee. I did however find a nice Ghee product at Costco for a fraction of the cost (large tub of Ghee there for $18), so that will be my go-to product going forward, but this one would be the runner up for those wanting to try it without committing to a huge container first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get a different brand, but they were out last time, so I thought I'd expand my horizons! I use this instead of butter both to be Paleo/Whole30 compliant, but I also feel better when I don't have full butter. This is really tasty and my hashbrowns have never tasted better! Great to have multiple Ghee providers I can rely on!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Household staple!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I’ve purchased 2x now and would buy a bigger jar next time so I don’t run out. Perfect for cooking everything and in coffee if I’m in that mood! Perfect flavor and comes packaged great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BLACK MOLD
customer_reviews.text: After one week of having this product and storing it in a cool dry place it grew BLACK MOLD. The texture of this ghee also is really gritty which doesn’t seem right to me. Go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product, I've been looking for something like that at my local market but I was not successful. I like the taste and everything about it. I'm almost out of the one I bought and will definitely get a bigger jar of for my family. Highly recommended for all type of fitness and diet level
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moncher

customer_reviews.title: Love using Ghee
customer_reviews.text: This is a different brand from previous purchase. Jar not as large, should have read description, but will just use it up more quickly. Like the flavor.. will probably purchase this brand again
customer_reviews.author: book hound

customer_reviews.title: While people are starving in the streets, nothing says "we don't care" like $25 a lb butter
customer_reviews.text: The reviews often trick people into buying products and someone in my family always shops by ratings. It's a shame, as I don't find it to be that exquisite of a flavor to merit the price tag. It's actually just opulence and a demonstration of wealth to buy the product. Yes, it was actually purchased in our account, I didn't do it. Would I buy $27 a lb butter? No. Not in my wildest dreams, but somebody in the household thinks this is what we need for our private jet to go along with our bottles of Crystal...... Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this GHEE as a less expensive alternative to the Bulletproof Ghee that I have really enjoyed. It comes packaged beautifully is this cute little jar. It is a little jar (smaller than I expected for the price). Buyers, please consider this as you make your purchase. This product is similar in appearance and spreadability. It does, however, to me, have a "metallic taste." I don't know why this would be. I will continue to experiment with organic Ghee products.
customer_reviews.author: Thepatguy

customer_reviews.title: You only get one bite
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting ghee I’ve ever had. HOWEVER, after the first time. It is impossible to get it open! I can’t explain it. I opened the jar, loved it. The second time, my hubby had to open it for me. The third time, he couldn’t open it. The lid swells tight. So although you will fall in love with the first bite, the first will also be your last.
customer_reviews.author: AB Chen

customer_reviews.title: In a class all by itself!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Ghee one other time and didn’t like it. I preferred Kerrygold Grass-fed Butter, but I now have to avoid all dairy. Ghee hasn’t any lactose or Casin so it is safe to eat even on a dairy free diet. This Ghee compared to any old Ghee is like night and day it is so amazing! I ever prefer it to butter it has such a rich taste. I will already but a bigger jar next order.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using 4th and Heart Ghee until I tried Gold Nugget. Comparing the two, I found Gold Nugget to be much more flavorful. It gives meats and veggies an extra tasty zip which I enjoy, and doesn't leave an oily residue in my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla H.

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard taste
customer_reviews.text: Did not taste like the Ghee I usually get from my local organic store. Had a very bland, unusual cardboard taste?
customer_reviews.author: donna c.

customer_reviews.title: Ghee is best lubricant for brain
customer_reviews.text: Really Enjoyed the smell and flavor it’s Amazing 😉 I usually get the Desi Ghee made near me but for online quick buy I highly recommend. I wish y’all started making it the way the Ayurvedic make it directly from Heavy Cream, then making the yogurt then making the butter and then Clarify butter to make Ghee so that the Cultures and Friendly Bacteria aren’t lost when not taking proper steps. Mum’s Ghee made by Vaidya R.K. Mishra.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Love

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for beginner Keto diet
customer_reviews.text: For those on the Ketogenic diet and just starting out or first time trying Ghee, I would recommend this product. I will say, the jar is tiny but the quality for the price is very good. Unlike other brands, it did not come with a rancid smell or taste. It spreads smoothly and taste like butter but a little more nutty. A little goes a long way. If you never tried Ghee before, try Gold Nugget, and if you like it, then step up to a higher quality brand like 4th & Heart. Happy buying!
customer_reviews.author: nolimitlb_2000

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: YES, THIS IS A BIT EXPENSIVE!!! BUT IT WAS DELIVERED AS PROMISED AND TASTES JUST GREAT. AN ADDED BONUS IT IS ACTUALLY VERY HEALTHY TO EAT THIS RATHER THAN BUTTER OR MARGERINE. TRY IT I THINK YOU WILL LIKE IT VERY MUCH. JUST A SIDE NOTE, I PUT THIS ON POPCORN AND IT REMINDED ME OF THE POPCORN WE USED TO GET AT THE MOVIES 50 YEARS AGO. BACK WHEN FOOD ACTUALLY TASTED GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Swett

customer_reviews.title: I’m a ghee fanatic
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is one of the best tasting I have had. Rich buttery taste. You can tell the cows were grass fed and pasture raised as cows that are, produce very rich buttery flavor. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mystify

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: By far I think this Ghee is the very best. I have tried others, even organic and others don't compare. Flavor is great1. Sad thing is it just goes to quickly in my house. Ill definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but I did find this brand slightly grainy
customer_reviews.text: People said this ghee wasn't grainy. Mine was...It hasn't expired yet so I'm still using it but I feel it's somewhat grainy and I really like smooth, creamy ghee much better. As for the flavor, I'd give it 5 stars...It doesn't have a gamey smell or odd flavor which is why I like it....Not sure I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: This ghee really deserve the five stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love the flavor it gives to my food. I bought some others at the supermarket, but not like yours, let me tell you, yours it's really delicious and nutritious. Believe me I really don't like to give ratings, but you really deserve one.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my first use of Ghee ever. I love it. However, the fact that it is the best I have ever had is not saying much. ;) It is quite good, and I can't imagine any other being better. Who knew what I was missing! I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Typing4aLiving

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent taste and quality, best I have tried far superior than what is available in our grocery stores. Would recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KayVee

customer_reviews.title: From USDA organic grass fed beef.
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of this ghee. I use it on toast, cooked vegetables, frying eggs - wherever I would use butter. I like that the milk is USDA organic from pasture raised beef, which provides health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: great ghee
customer_reviews.text: I use ghee instead of butter. so instead of butter on toast, I use ghee. I use it in baking. I use it in cooking. a nicer flavor and doesn't have the milk products. I sometimes add it to olive oil or avocado oil when I'm sautéing veggies. yum, yum!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lou

customer_reviews.title: WAAAY OVERPRICED for SUB-PAR TASTE & TEXTURE
customer_reviews.text: 4th & Heart's Ghee is grassfed, cheaper priced, smoother (whipped creamy at room temp), and more rich and buttery tasting. I regret wasting money on this tiny jar of grainy, liquidy, bland tasting ghee. Customer service also never got back to me about a question I had, after their canned initial auto-reply. CUTE LOGO...that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ghee
customer_reviews.text: We love this ghee, it is our brand of choice. Unfortunately it arrived cracked and we had to throw it away. It is no fault to the seller, as it most likely happened during transit. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good for you too.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to use in my morning coffee, but the flavor of the butter is so delicious I'm using to add finishing flavor to veggies, as a spread, etc. I went through my 8 oz jar in a few weeks and going with the 16 oz jar from now on. It's fantastic! A foodie friend recently gifted me with an assortment of delicious artisan butter from small producers in France, Norway, and Japan, and Golden Nugget's ghee is just as flavorful, if not better. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly, safely packaged. We like the taste of this ghee, but we do prefer another brand over this one, hence the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: E.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tasted or cooked with ghee before but was curious. I read all the wonderful reviews about this one and had to try it. I wasn't disappointed. It has a higher smoking point than butter and possesses its own rich flavor that adds to anything you cook it in. I can't wait to find more ways to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne R.

customer_reviews.title: Get you some of this Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Use this for all my cast iron cooking. High smoke point and tastes awesome. Love that you can travel with out having to refrigerate. Used on a baking sheet without tin foil and the biscuits didn’t stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Giello

customer_reviews.title: It's delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I've never eaten ghee before. It's good on several things. I've tried it on potatoes, crackers,rice and I'm excited to try it with shrimp. A little goes a long way. But I think I will keep some in my pantry at all times from now on. It's good to try new things!
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good but spendy
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the size of the jar because this was some SPENDY ghee. Good stuff, really liked it, but will find other options for the long-term based on price.
customer_reviews.author: Loonsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: i try a LOT of ghee's and this was the first time trying this product It's fantastic. great flavor some ghee's can be down right hard to out back, this is in the top of the list of all around best ghee's.
customer_reviews.author: lpm

customer_reviews.title: Superior taste and quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It has a fresh buttery taste, smooth texture, melts beautifully, and just compliments so many different types of food. I had not tried ghee before ordering this product, so I'm not sure how it compares to other brands, but this one has been so perfect that I will order this same brand again vs. taking a chance on something different.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Thanksgiving recipe, so I've only used it once. The recipe was good but I honestly couldn't tell the difference between the ghee or regular butter since I'd never made the recipe before. I'll know better when I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoGeek

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The item was received intact and wrapped securely. I’m currently on the Keto diet and use this in my bulletproof coffee and use it in cooking. It is absolutely delicious. This is my 2nd jar. I liked it so much I bought the 32 oz jar.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Moore

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ghee to have in place of butter for my January Whole30 and I love it! I put it in my fatty coffee and also put it on vegetables and it soups. It adds such a great flavor! I can't wait to try the other flavors as well but will need to wait until after January is over. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste but my wife does not
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste but my wife does not. Because of this I will probably switching to something that we can both enjoy. We are now using certified organic unrefined coconut oil which is the healthiest oil to use for cooking and good for memory loss.
customer_reviews.author: claude

customer_reviews.title: Expensive... but good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for the healthy diet. Sure it costs more but its good quality Ghee. Easier than making from scratch that's for sure and almost as good. Great supplement for many uses, but yes I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M

customer_reviews.title: Best ghee ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ghee I have ever had. It has a nice light aroma when cooking and I think it gives the food a better flavor too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packaged and unbroken! It tastes delicious, I even eat it by the spoon full. It has an interesting rich caramel like flavor. I would definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: anon ymous

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Ghee...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ghee (that is not flavored) that I have liked. Ghee is very good for you but, it can be a acquired taste. This ghee is exceptional... very buttery (duh), rich flavor. From the packaging to the jar this stuff is golden. Great for paleo/ keto diets and for health in general.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Chiodo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with this product. The presentation is appealing, and the taste was very good. I even took some to a restaurant and shared it with a friend. We both loved it on our steamed vegetables. I also used it on a baked sweet potato, as well as squash. I’m already ordering another jar. This has a great flavor and is compliant with my Whole30 meal plan. I will order this on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: pblack

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling
customer_reviews.text: Smells and tastes like a good quality ghee. I’ve had ghee that smelled a little off but this stuff smells kind of sweet. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: YEAAA
customer_reviews.text: THIS BUTTER IS SOOOO GOOD. ITS PACKAGED BEAUTIFULLY AND COMES WITH A CARD AND A THANK YOU CARD WITH A DESCRIPTION OF THE OWNERS BUSINESS. ITS SOFT AND JUST HAS A SMOOTH MILD CREAMY TASTE . I WONT BUY ANYTHING ELSE
customer_reviews.author: sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several ghee products, and Gold Nugget Ghee is my absolute favorite. Good texture and good, clean flavor. Delicious! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Ghee is good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had been asking for clarified butter to cook with. I ordered him Ghh by Gold Nugget and he is thrilled. It does give food an amazing taste and the aroma is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. I've ordered it again and trust the second jar will be as good as the first. I sometimes make my own ghee, but I can't compare to this product.
customer_reviews.author: JayByrd

customer_reviews.title: Healthy alternative to butter
customer_reviews.text: This product taste just like butter and is aged like a cheese we keep it refrigerated so like butter you have to warm it to spread it mainly use it for a little different flavor when sautéing veggies for my wife’s very picky diet
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I will buy more because it's good quality. I use it every morning for my bullet proof coffee. It's delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Agnar150

customer_reviews.title: A Keto Diet staple ..
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cook on high heat.. it doesn’t burn and adds great flavor to my foods.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary vieira

customer_reviews.title: The best Ghee is have used.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every morning. It has a soft creamy texture and the flavor wonderful. I also like this company’s Ghee with vanilla and lavender- AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: MimiDeb62

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on a whim and was pleased with the taste and texture and promptly added to my Save & Subscribe profile. Then, I did the unthinkable, I tried a different a competitors product on the recommendation of a friend. While it looked it was ghee, it was not Gold Nugget Ghee! I've since returned to the fold, much to the happiness of my family and will continue my subscription. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying ghee. I was afraid i wouldn't know if it was good or not, since i never tried it before, but it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Firefly88

customer_reviews.title: This ghee is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is so perfect! I’m a total ghee noob and the first one I tried was the Turmeric and Lion’s Mane. It’s good to mix with veggies but it’s just so potent it’s not ideal for everything. Really happy with the plain ghee and will be checking out the Yak and Goat ghee soon!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaTsc

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for the volume
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the quality of this product, but not happy about paying $14 for a small jar where I can be getting other ghee products that are just as good for less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy. I put it in my coffee and use it to saute veggies and sometimes just eat a spoonful (stop judging me). Great company and great product! Will buy more in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Dmb#41

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I am picky about ghee. This brand has great flavor and spreadability. Other brands have so little flavor I have to use a ton to my food. This ghee’s flavor is perfectly balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice consistency and taste
customer_reviews.text: This is a more neutral flavored ghee than others I've tried. Nice consistency and good for sautéing/stove, but some might prefer a sweeter or more caramel flavored ghee for baking or toast, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and perfect packaging
customer_reviews.text: Keep making the product! It's expensive BUT one of the best I have ever tried. :) And most importantly, it's in glass container. No plastic cancer!
customer_reviews.author: Circles

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Yellow Color!💛
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is a gorgeous yellow!! The packaging is cute and fresh looking! I expected to notice a better flavor in my food vs. my $9 13oz. jar from Sprouts because this brand's color is so much brighter. But I haven't noticed a difference in the taste of my food. I will continue to choose Gold Nugget brand though because it is organic!
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: Best Organic Ghee butter
customer_reviews.text: I used to get a ghee butter all the way from mongolia from my home country. Cuz that was only option to get 100% organic natural ghee butter from grass fed cows. But now I found this same quality of ghee butter and i don't have to waste time ordering from Mongolia. i use this every morning adding to my coffee or oatmeal and the flavor of this ghee is the best one in here which i highly recommend 👌
customer_reviews.author: Maya & Turuu

customer_reviews.title: Ghee got mold within three weeks
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this ghee is nice. I had tried different brands in the past. I switched to this brand because of perfect reviews and claims. very upset that it got mold within three weeks. I never put ghee in the fridge and I have been using ghee for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tasneem Sayyeda

customer_reviews.title: Creamy texture but lacks flavor
customer_reviews.text: Nice creamy texture. I really appreciate the traditional process used by these folks. Unfortunately, for me, there really is no flavor to this ghee. Disapponting. I love the texture and process, but prefer the rich flavor I have found in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Slightly nutty taste that I really like. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Likes a great deal...

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve ever consumed ghee. It is nutty smelling and tasting and is delicious. I primarily purchased it to add to my cup of bulletproof coffee every morning for my Keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor...a hint of caramel...I could eat it by the spoon. I use it like regular butter to saute food, and to make sauces, and spread over toast.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this ghee!
customer_reviews.text: I order a jar approx every 2 months. I use it every day. I love the flavor and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: boopzdoodl

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Ghee; I use all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love that this not only tastes great but is organic and grass-fed as well as being shelf stable! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey Reina

customer_reviews.title: As good as ghee gets
customer_reviews.text: For years I've made my own grass fed ghee from Kerrygold unsalted butter and I thought it couldn't be better, but I was wrong. Gold Nugget Ghee is better. Beautiful color, flavor, it doesn't have a strong "nutty" flavor, which is really just the residual flavor from frying the milk solids too long in the clarified butter. And, it's from my home state of California, which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tasted great! Knowing it is better for my body is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: iamkam

customer_reviews.title: very delicious
customer_reviews.text: delicious, can be used for anything that you would use butter.. just less than what you normaly would.
customer_reviews.author: melissa rohr

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good flavor but I prefer a more aromatic ghee so will continue to pay a few bucks more for my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: D. Castro

customer_reviews.title: tastiest commercial ghee I have tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with the real deal so it's obviously a compromise when I buy/use commercial ghee. I've not tried a huge bunch but this was is the best I have tasted so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shama Bole

customer_reviews.title: Beat another top brand
customer_reviews.text: First time using ghee. Bought this brand and Hey Boo. Gold nugget won with freshness and flavor. I try to use it in ways I can taste the difference in using this or butter/olive oil like when sautéing onions and or mushrooms with a little wine, herbs and garlic. YUM
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: The Ghee arrived undamaged and in a timely manner. The quality of the Ghee is as expected; nice golden color and smooth firm consistency. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: D.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum yum yum yum! Exactly what I've been looking for I couldn't find it in the store so I'm happy I founded year and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: SassySicilian

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Quality Taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Restaurant quality!!! I used for my crab legs and it was delicious. Rich buttery flavor. Had to add salt but the bottom line is that it tasted like the butter served with my seafood without the salty milk fat the generally accompanied store bought melted butter!
customer_reviews.author: Levanche

customer_reviews.title: Ghee purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am on a specific diet for Fibromyalgia, and some recipes ask for Ghee. That is the reason for that purchase. I have never tried before. It is a good product, only expensive for the amount contained.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: High quality ghee
customer_reviews.text: Love this and it’s been used so often. Nice almost nutty flavor and awesome for cooking.

customer_reviews.title: With caramel
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t taste like traditional grass fed butter. I didn’t know Smell and tast have caramel.
customer_reviews.author: Bolortuul

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is inconsistent. liquid on top, granular on the bottom. The flavor is bland and odd. The lid seals so tightly that it's hard to undo. Won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AH Alexander

customer_reviews.title: insanely tasty
customer_reviews.text: wow,, never tasted Ghee like this before! the caramel notes made me want to eat it straight out of the jar - have tried many other Ghees but none as good as this one..
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Incredible...
customer_reviews.text: This Ghee is the best ghee i have ever tasted. Usually if it is dark yellow it means its definitely natural and grass-fed.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Glass jar and use in recipes. Good product to have on hand if u like to cook from scratch.

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it. It had no butter flavor and its gritty. It will be dog food topping.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and coats a piece of banana bread better than ordinary butter.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is amazing! Will definitely be ordering often
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this is a fairly local (to me) Company! The taste is amazing! Will definitely be ordering often.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear824

customer_reviews.title: Superbutter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing stuff. Yes, grass fed butter is the new health food. As described on the jar, this stuff has caramel undertones. Absolutely delicious.

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised. This is my first time ever purchasing or tasting Ghee I have discovered that I absolutely love it it is so delicious. I would highly recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The product portion size is a great value for the money. So far the product seems to be pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, fast delivery, fresh and delicious. Over all, happy with the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have an alternative butter that is natural.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and natural! So glad I found this product and will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

product_meta.title: TRADITIONAL GHEE BY GOLD NUGGET GHEE, USDA ORGANIC, FULL-YEAR/PASTURE-RAISED, GRASS-FED BUTTER 8oz
product_meta.description:
Size:8 Ounce (Pack of 1)CLARIFIED SPREADABLE BUTTER 8oz

 Why is our Gold Nugget Ghee special? Here in Northern California we benefit from a rainforest environment that allows our cows to have full-year access to green grass pastures. We then lovingly clarify our cow butter over a slow open flame to remove all the water and milk solids. The result is a delicious decadent spread with nutty buttery notes and choc-full of health benefits. Ghee is high in Vitamin A, D, K2, Omega 3's, and Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA). 

 Ghee is considered the golden elixir of Ayurveda, and originates in ancient India. 

 Use as a healthy alternative to butter, cooking oil in recipes, or blast your brain with essential fats in your morning coffee or tea to get your day started!

 Gold Nugget Ghee is the highest grade product made with your health and our planet in mind.

 Store in a cool, dry place. Refrigeration is optional. While clarified butter is shelf stable, use a clean utensil to avoid introducing anything foreign into the jar. 

 Ingredient: Organic full-year/pasture-raised butter (milk)
feature_bullets: USDA ORGANIC AND CERTIFIED ORGANIC BY CCOF
RICH IN VITAMIN A, D, K2, OMEGA 3's, 482F SMOKE POINT
FULL YEAR PASTURE RAISED + GRASS FED
